about_the_game:
Hundreds of years have passed since your kind, sentient artificial intelligence, has left Earth. AIs have since flourished in the galaxy while humans have long since been forgotten. You find yourself brought online in on a crash site on Earth. You must explore, gather resources, build, and unlock old human technologies to survive the hordes of mutated bugs that now rule the planet. House humans, feed them, tend to their social needs, and provide meaningful employment. Or just work them to death. You're the boss now!

Build base and defend

Construct a fortress against the nightly wave of bugs. Harvest, refine, and construct items to support your growing base.

Human refugees

Feed and house humans in exchange for their help. Automate supply chains, harvesting tasks, and defenses with humans' employment.

Improve your robot

Upgrade and customize your robot character to match your play style, whether focused on base building or on combat.

Explore a toxic wasteland

Venture beyond your base for rare materials and epic bug fights.

short_description: Reclaim Earth is a base-building, colony management, survival game where you play as a semi benevolent robot crash-landed on a post apocalyptic Earth. You must build your base, enlist the help of humans, and defend against hordes of mutated bugs.
